${project.artifactId}:ThreeOfAKind.NAME: Three of a Kind
${project.artifactId}:ThreeOfAKind.DESCRIPTION: Play the same card 3 times in a row

${project.artifactId}:FourOfAKind.NAME: Four of a Kind
${project.artifactId}:FourOfAKind.DESCRIPTION: Play the same card 4 times in a row

${project.artifactId}:DoubleKill.NAME: Double Kill
${project.artifactId}:DoubleKill.DESCRIPTION: Defeat two enemies at the same time

${project.artifactId}:TripleKill.NAME: Triple Kill
${project.artifactId}:TripleKill.DESCRIPTION: Defeat 3 enemies at the same time

${project.artifactId}:QuadraKill.NAME: Quadra Kill
${project.artifactId}:QuadraKill.DESCRIPTION: Defeat 4 enemies at the same time

${project.artifactId}:PentaKill.NAME: Penta Kill
${project.artifactId}:PentaKill.DESCRIPTION: Defeat 5 enemies at the same time

${project.artifactId}:EmptyHanded.NAME: Empty Handed
${project.artifactId}:EmptyHanded.DESCRIPTION: End your turn with no cards in your hand
